info.title: Rentx Cars API Documentation
info.description: This is the Rentx API for car rentals. Below is documented in detail all the features of the application.

tags.name: authentication
tags.description: Authenticate a user in the application

parameters.name: type_filter
parameters.description: Type filter to be applied: name, brand or category_id

post.summary: Create a new specification to the car
post.description: Create a new specification to the car.
Update the refresh-token, accepted by `header`, `query` or `body`.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The refresh-token to be used to reset the password

post.summary: Send an email to the user with password reset information
post.description: Send an email to the user with password reset information.

400.description: Car does not exists! `or` This car is already rented! `or` There's a rental in progress for user! `or` Expected return date less than 24 hours

get.description: List all rentals by user. The user is captured from token.
